snippet.title: Otosan: Nintendo 3DS Edition - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This game is extremely short. You can read more about why I'm releasing this now, as well as future plans, on my public Patreon article:
https://www.patreon.com/posts/worlds-first-10-second-3ds-game-78837961

You probably don't want to buy this, but technically you can:
https://ec.nintendo.com/title_purchase_confirm?title=50010000049775

Song: "Ash's House" by William Kage
Album: Otosan First Day Demo OST
https://williamkage.bandcamp.com/album/otosan-first-day-demo-ost
